title: Using Trupanion (ticker: TRUP) FY2023 10-K calculate EV/Revenue multiple. Use diluted WASO for market cap calculation. Assume share price of $50. Show the answer rounded to 2 decimals.

rubric.criteria: Enterprise value formula used = market cap + current portion of long-term debt + long-term debt (noncurrent) + preferred equity - cash and equivalents - short-term investments - long-term investments
